page.title: 14PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: {Kemble}has a{bus service}which runs every day. The first bus which comes into Kemble is at 7.05 a.m. and the last is at 7.05 p.m. The bus service runs every day except Sundays and Bank Holidays. The colour of the service buses is green. Every green bus which goes through Kemble goes up to the { {Railway Station.}The trains go to{ {Swindon}and{Paddington}in one direction, and to{Gloucester, Stroud } and{Cheltenham}in the other. Our station is only a tiny one but it takes quite a few people on the platform. The busiest road in{Kemble} is the main road which runs from{ {Cirecester}to{Malmesbury.
